snippet: The big French bank reported a second-quarter profit of 433 million euros, a drop of 42 percent from last year and well below what analysts forecast.
abstract: The big French bank reported a second-quarter profit of 433 million euros, a drop of 42 percent from last year and well below what analysts forecast.

headline.main: Société Générale’s Profit Falls Below Expectations
headline.print_headline: Société Générale’s Profit Falls Below Expectations
